alfredsnippet.snippet:
Hi {x}, hope you're doing well!

We need to send a 1099-DIV for the payout last year, but we don't have your tax information on file.

Would you be able to send me a W9 as soon as you can? A blank version is attached.

I appreciate the help!

Thanks,
Chris
alfredsnippet.name: Zesty Shareholder Friend
